thread.title: Proxibid Appoints Scott Zenor as VP of Software Development and Quality Assurance
thread.title_full: Proxibid Appoints Scott Zenor as VP of Software Development and Quality Assurance

title: Proxibid Appoints Scott Zenor as VP of Software Development and Quality Assurance
text:
Proxibid Appoints Scott Zenor as VP of Software Development and Quality Assurance [September 15, 2015] Tweet 
Proxibid ( www.proxibid.com ), the most trusted online Marketplace for buying and selling highly valued items, today announced that Scott Zenor has joined the rapidly growing ecommerce company as Vice President of Software Development and Quality Assurance. 
Mr. Zenor brings more than 29 years of experience and an advanced understanding of Agile ( News - Alert ) Scrum methodologies from his roles at Alorica (formerly West Corporation) and Infogroup, where he has served in numerous roles. In his previous role as Senior Vice President of Information Technology at Infogroup, he led the adoption of Service Oriented Architecture and directed the re-architecture of three products, where his team primarily focused on development, maintenance, and system availability of customer-facing web applications, APIs, smart phone applications, and physical product delivery to end users. 
"Proxibid is thrilled to have Scott join the team," said Ryan Downs, President and CEO. "Scott's proven experience in all stages of system and application development will increase our speed-to-market with new and innovative products and services for buyers and sellers across the globe. We are excited to see what his seasoned leadership can provide for our organization, especially as we rapidly increase headcount on our software development and quality assurance teams." 
Mr. Zenor's skillset will prove instrumental as Proxibid explores new product offerings. The Proxibid Marketplace is backed by the indstry's most sophisticated fraud prevention tools, a hybrid of proprietary technology, manual processes, and third-party partnerships. Proxibid is 100 percent PCI ( News - Alert ) compliant, and has an infrastructure that boasts a 99.9+% uptime. Mr. Zenor will be influential in diversifying product offerings and ensuring the continued legacy of trust and security Proxibid has built. 
"Proxibid's dedication to risk management, reliability of its platform, and innovation are key foundations to its success," said Zenor. "But there is a lot of uncharted territory that I am excited to explore. Proxibid's team is creative, hard-working, and ready for the next level, and I am thrilled to be joining the team at this high growth time." 
Scott Zenor on Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/pub/scott-zenor/7/23a/69b 
Proxibid Social
